thread.section_title: Hotel Square Louvois - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice little hotel
thread.title_full: Nice little hotel - Review of Hotel Square Louvois, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mommyof3three
title: Nice little hotel
text:
The staff here were wonderful. From squeezing us into a room for early checkin (just had a little over 8 hours flight) to recommending some great restaurants and even making reservations. Modern room, spacious bathroom and I felt like at home with a Nespresso machine in my room . Close to public transit , quiet neighbourhood. Good price for the room
You won't be disappointed
